ack.title: Authors’ contributions
ack.p: CFD and MSL conceived and designed the experiment. LvR and CFD performed the experiment, LvR and MSL carried out the lab work. CFD and LvR analysed the data and wrote the first draft, all authors contributed to the final manuscript. All authors read and approved the final manuscript.

sec.title: Availability of data and materials
sec.p: The datasets analysed during the current study are available in the BExIS repository, as data set number 20186 ( http://www.bexis.uni-jena.de; currently pending amendments of some meta-data).
